hints.label: cor-structural-error-contraction
hints.title: Structural Error Contraction
hints.content:
6907: :label: cor-structural-error-contraction
6908: 
6909: Under the same conditions as {prf:ref}`thm-positional-variance-contraction`, the structural error also contracts:
6910: 
6911: $$
6912: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone}}[V_{\text{struct}}(S'_1, S'_2)] \leq (1 - \kappa_{\text{struct}}) V_{\text{struct}}(S_1, S_2) + C_{\text{struct}}
6913: $$
hints.raw_directive:
6904: The positional variance contraction has immediate consequences for the structural error $V_{\text{struct}}$.
6905: 
6906: :::{prf:corollary} Structural Error Contraction
6907: :label: cor-structural-error-contraction
6908: 
6909: Under the same conditions as {prf:ref}`thm-positional-variance-contraction`, the structural error also contracts:
6910: 
6911: $$
6912: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone}}[V_{\text{struct}}(S'_1, S'_2)] \leq (1 - \kappa_{\text{struct}}) V_{\text{struct}}(S_1, S_2) + C_{\text{struct}}
6913: $$
6914:

hints.label: proof-cor-structural-error-contraction
hints.content:
6918: :::{prf:proof}
6919: :label: proof-cor-structural-error-contraction
6920: **Proof.**
6921: 
6922: By {prf:ref}`lem-sx-implies-variance`:
6923: 
6924: $$
6925: V_{\text{struct}} \leq 2(\text{Var}_1(x) + \text{Var}_2(x))
6926: $$
6927: 
6928: where $\text{Var}_k(x) = \frac{1}{k_{\text{alive}}} \sum_{i \in \mathcal{A}(S_k)} \|\delta_{x,k,i}\|^2$.
6929: 
6930: The contraction of $V_{\text{Var},x}$ (which is proportional to the sum of these variances) immediately implies contraction of $V_{\text{struct}}$.
6931: 
6932: The constant $\kappa_{\text{struct}}$ depends on $\kappa_x$ and the relationship between $N$-normalized and $k_{\text{alive}}$-normalized variances.
hints.raw_directive:

6923:

6925: V_{\text{struct}} \leq 2(\text{Var}_1(x) + \text{Var}_2(x))
6926: $$
6927: 
6928: where $\text{Var}_k(x) = \frac{1}{k_{\text{alive}}} \sum_{i \in \mathcal{A}(S_k)} \|\delta_{x,k,i}\|^2$.
6929: 
6930: The contraction of $V_{\text{Var},x}$ (which is proportional to the sum of these variances) immediately implies contraction of $V_{\text{struct}}$.
6931: 
6932: The constant $\kappa_{\text{struct}}$ depends on $\kappa_x$ and the relationship between $N$-normalized and $k_{\text{alive}}$-normalized variances.
